__e: Frank, you know better than anyone that intelligence is power.
No, look, people are talking about us, and it looks like I fed you the information, and we both know I didn't, so...
People are smart. They want information. Not junk, which is all you're willing to give them.
Ma'am... ..I found the information you were requesting.
[ Cellphone chimes ] And that should be the security video and information you asked me to dig up and send you.
The information I require is in two places.
i know it's dangerous for us all to meet like this, but the information i have is important, very,very important.
But all is well because you've discovered that the information we can't tell anybody we're looking for exists on a page...
I'm just giving you the information I have, I don't care what you do with it.
Look, I don't know who told you I had anything to do with your father's death... but their information is faulty... or they are deliberately not telling you the truth.
'Cause the information is here, and nobody else knows where it is.
Regardless of whose side she's on, she may know how that Intel got to her brother.
